price: 75. Lagama nuxuusiyo (Naarta), iyagoo halkaa gudaheeda ku quusan.
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
